title: How to start a blog about startups - Quora

response.answer_text: In my opinion, there are 2 things on which you can initiate your blog about. 1- How to initiate startup 2- How the startup could have a successful one. Before starting a blog or before writing anything. Build up a habit to read a lot. The more you read, the more fruitful will your content be. Always remember to provide some solutions to startups in your blog. If you started to provide solutions to people it will help you to drive more traffic to your blogs. And people will start knowing about you. Research on the internet regarding startups. Search around your locality, you will find 100s of startups, struggling or setting up big milestones. Ask them, interview them. You can create more chances to get live facts and figures. It's about creating opportunities. If you have decided to a niche go ahead and research a lot and write down what you have. You will succeed one-day Inshallah.
If you know so much about startups you should start a startup not a blog.
